text:
Recently opened, we were there on the first week-end. Loved it!

Definetly child friendly, mostly because of the efficient service, the friendly staff and the nutella pizza. But I also could see myself getting a few cocktails with my friends there. 

A big thumb's up for having no television in the place! Note to other restaurant owner : huge screens are not mandatory in your restaurant ; it does not add anything to the whole experience, plus all the other places have one or more. Do something else to set yourself appart!

Une nouvelle pizzeria à St-Sauveur, cuisson au four à bois. Une très bonne pâte, fine au centre et généreuse sur les bord. Les pizzas ont l'esprit du sud de l'Italie. Définitivement recommandable.
Service rapide et agréable.
Très bonne pizza de qualitée. La meilleure des Laurentides à mon avis. Prenez l'huîle épicé!

Amazing food loved the tiramisu and burrata  and great staff/ service.
Although prices are kinda high definitely a try for pizza and Italian good lovers..
